home.various-types-of-metal-structures-first: Various types of metal structures, decor
home.about-us-first-p: We are ready to offer you the full range of services for the manufacture and transportation of metal structures. Despite the fact that many enterprises try to increase production rates by any means, we carefully monitor the quality of products, because safety and reliability depend on this.
home.about-us-second-p: Also, we, SP Metallinvest, closely cooperate with leading manufacturers of rolled metal and their dealers throughout Ukraine and regions, which allows us to purchase the materials necessary for the fulfillment of orders as quickly as possible. Our own delivery service delivers metal structures, rolled metal, materials, components and products to the facility where the installation is carried out.
home.why-should-you-work-with-us: Why should you work with us?
home.individual-approach-p: We offer the development of your unique product. We analyze and design.
home.own-production-areas-p: We use our equipment to make your product.
home.high-precision-equipment-p: We work with equipment of various complexity. Including with high-precision.
home.finished-products-p: We offer the manufacture of products based on ready-made cutouts.
home.fast-deadlines-p: We fulfill orders on time, within the stipulated time, or earlier.
home.delivery-p: We have our own transport, which we use to deliver your products within Kyiv.
home.metal-cover-second-p: for the exit part of the pavilion
home.laser-cutting-of-metal-second-p: complexity by the method of laser cutting
home.do-you-want-to-order-a-product: Do you want to order a product or discuss an order?

production.steel-building-structures-p: Building metal structures of our production are used in industrial and civil construction of buildings and structures, workshops, warehouse complexes, shopping and entertainment centers and other structures.
production.designer-steel-products-p1: Metallic decor looks good in any style: Either classic or hi-tech. For example, you can order an elegant table or an elegant candle light to emphasize the refinement of the interior.
production.designer-steel-products-p2: Furniture and partitions in loft style
production.protective-container-for-generator-h1-p4: For petrol generators with capacity from 6 to 8 kW
production.protective-container-for-generator-h2-p1: Perforation for ventilation and optimum cooling of engine compartment
production.protective-container-for-generator-h2-p2: Priming and painting 80 microns, color according to RAL.
production.protective-container-for-generator-h2-p3: For access to the generator (fuel filling and service) on the top and the front side there are doors
production.protective-container-for-generator-h3: Packaging: A stretch film corrugated board.
production.protective-container-for-generator-h4: Delivery: by a carrier in the cities of Ukraine.

furnace.name: Burzhuyka
furnace.furnace-p1: — metal stove for heating rooms and cooking, from the manufacturer.
furnace.furnace-p2: The height of the metal product is 550 millimeters. The diameter of the product is 400 millimeters.
furnace.furnace-p3: The weight of the burzhuyka is 40 kilograms. There is a cooking surface for cooking.

building-metal-structures.name: Building metal structures
building-metal-structures.building-metal-structures-p: – load-bearing elements of quickly erected buildings, such as beams, trusses, columns, wall and roof purlins.
building-metal-structures.building-metal-structures-p1: They are made of steel profiles, including thin-walled ones, and during assembly and installation, they are securely fastened together with special parts and metal products or with the help of welding.
building-metal-structures.building-metal-structures-p2: Building structures can have different shapes, but the main requirement for them is strength, resistance to mechanical loads and durability.
building-metal-structures.building-metal-structures-p3: We carefully control the quality of steel profiles and all stages of production of load-bearing structural elements from them.
building-metal-structures.building-metal-structures-p4: Metal structures manufactured by our company fully meet the requirements and current standards.

reinforcement-frames-and-embedded-produc.name: Armature frames
reinforcement-frames-and-embedded-produc.reinforcement-frames-and-embedded-produc: – it is the leading element of reinforced concrete piles, thanks to which their strength and stability is ensured.
Boring and injection piles with a diameter of 150 to 1500 mm are an indispensable supporting element of buildings and structures in modern construction.
The reinforcing frame prevents pile deformation and significantly reduces the risk of the structure collapsing.
Frames are manufactured by our company from steel smooth or ribbed rod, strip and wire on special equipment according to the technological standard.

In the manufacturing process, we control the quality of raw materials and the final product, taking into account the current requirements for similar metal structures that experience high mechanical loads during operation.

anchor-blocks-and-foundation-bolts.name: Anchor blocks and bolts
anchor-blocks-and-foundation-bolts.anchor-blocks-and-foundation-bolts-p: – elements that are laid during the arrangement of the foundation base and are intended for fastening production equipment and metal structures.
anchor-blocks-and-foundation-bolts.anchor-blocks-and-foundation-bolts-p1: These fastening elements ensure the stability of equipment and structures during operation, reliably fix them on the base, but if necessary, do not prevent the removal and transfer of units and frames to another place.
anchor-blocks-and-foundation-bolts.anchor-blocks-and-foundation-bolts-p2: Collateral parts are made of rolled steel (sheet, armature, etc.).
anchor-blocks-and-foundation-bolts.anchor-blocks-and-foundation-bolts-p3: Our company manufactures to order anchor bolts and foundation blocks of any complexity according to GOST or non-standard parameters according to the customer's drawings.
anchor-blocks-and-foundation-bolts.anchor-blocks-and-foundation-bolts-p4: During production, the quality of raw materials and the final product, its compliance with the requirements of the standard and reliability under heavy mechanical loads and climatic conditions are strictly controlled.

support-fasteners-of-tower-cranes.name: tower crane construction and maintenance
support-fasteners-of-tower-cranes.support-fasteners-of-tower-cranes-p1: For this, anchors are used for fastening to the base from below and horizontal supports that hold the main structure in a vertical position.
support-fasteners-of-tower-cranes.support-fasteners-of-tower-cranes-p2: Anchors and horizontal supports from beams - ties, tie rods, crane ties, frames are made of rolled steel - corner, channel, pipe, sheet or I-beam.
support-fasteners-of-tower-cranes.support-fasteners-of-tower-cranes-p3: Our company manufactures tower cranes of any configuration and complexity from high-quality materials to order according to the customer's individual drawings.
support-fasteners-of-tower-cranes.support-fasteners-of-tower-cranes-p4: We guarantee the strength and reliability of our products, as well as their compliance with current standards.

input-group.name: Stairs, porch, railing, canopy, ramp, doors and other elements
input-group.input-group-p: belong to the entrance group and are located at the entrance to the building, including its inner hall.
input-group.input-group-p1: Such elements, united by a single design, are very popular in trade, office, commercial production companies that seek to emphasize their own corporate style and attract the attention of the target audience.
input-group.input-group-p2: Our company is ready to manufacture elements of the entrance group from metal according to sketches. For this, we have at our disposal the necessary equipment and experienced personnel, ready to perform the most difficult tasks.
input-group.input-group-p3: During the production of metal products, we strictly control the quality of raw materials and the finished product, striving to fully satisfy the wishes of the customer.
input-group.input-group-p4: Thanks to many years of experience and hard work, we have taken key positions in the market and gained a reputation as a reliable partner that fulfills its obligations.

non-standard-metal-structures-and-equipm.name: non-standard metal structures
non-standard-metal-structures-and-equipm.non-standard-metal-structures-and-equipm: assumes that the manufacturer, without going beyond the accepted rules, creates new constructive solutions and models.
Such designs are widely popular among creative architects and designers who want to implement exclusive ideas.

Our company manufactures non-standard metal structures according to your drawings, using high-quality rolled steel - L, Z, C, U, T configuration profiles, round and profiled pipes, circle, square, sheet, strip and other assortment of shaped and graded or reinforced rolled products.
Our designs are reliable, stable and durable.
Extensive experience in the field of manufacturing metal structures makes us a leading player in this field, which is trusted and constantly uses its services.

Often in industry, agriculture and other industries there is a need to manufacture non-standard equipment to replace worn out unique equipment and structural elements that are part of the technological lines.
Our company manufactures non-standard equipment with non-standard dimensions and technical data to order according to your drawings.
We will manufacture containers, tanks, bunkers, silo groups, production containers and other equipment.
By ordering the manufacture of equipment from us, you can be sure of reliability and functionality, as well as the high quality of the final product.
We have an equipped production base with the necessary machines and units that allow us to manufacture equipment of any configuration and size.

loft-style-furniture-and-partitions.name: Industrial interior style,
loft-style-furniture-and-partitions.loft-style-furniture-and-partitions-p: invented in the middle of the last century, does not lose its popularity to this day.
loft-style-furniture-and-partitions.loft-style-furniture-and-partitions-p1: This style is truly universal and democratic, both luxury and simplicity are acceptable in it.
loft-style-furniture-and-partitions.loft-style-furniture-and-partitions-p2: We offer the manufacture of partitions and furniture in the style of a loft made of metal, filled with glass and other materials.
loft-style-furniture-and-partitions.loft-style-furniture-and-partitions-p3: Deaf partitions, as well as equipped with hinged, sliding or folding doors in an «accordion», are appropriate both in residential and in office, retail, and industrial premises.
loft-style-furniture-and-partitions.loft-style-furniture-and-partitions-p4: With the help of partitions, you can carry out successful zoning, and with loft-style furniture you can create coziness and a unique atmosphere.

plasma-cutting-of-metal.first-p: Processing of metal blanks up to 30 mm thick using plasma cutting.
plasma-cutting-of-metal.second-p: Precise and shaped cutting of metal without further improvement by grinding and other operations.
plasma-cutting-of-metal.third-p: The cutting tool is a plasma jet, which is created by an electric arc.
plasma-cutting-of-metal.fourth-p: The cut is heated by a plasma beam to the highest temperatures (up to 30,000 degrees), while the air or gas supply speed is up to 1.5 thousand m/s.
plasma-cutting-of-metal.fifth-p: We process ferrous and non-ferrous metals and alloys with high precision according to any cut configuration, sketches and customer wishes.

metal-cutting-with-a-bandsaw.first-p: We offer artificial cutting of rolled metal on a semi-automatic guillotine machine «Mit1-03N» with a band saw
metal-cutting-with-a-bandsaw.second-p: Rotation, forward movement, lifting of the machine frame at an angle and clamping of the processed workpiece are carried out with the help of hydraulic systems.
metal-cutting-with-a-bandsaw.third-p: Characteristic features of the machine are accuracy with a minimum error of up to 0.1 mm, the possibility of cutting at an angle, a clean cut - the absence of burrs, chips and melting of the edges.
metal-cutting-with-a-bandsaw.fourth-p: With the help of a machine with a band saw, it is possible to process profiled, graded, shaped rolled metal - pipes, channels, corners, I-beams, circles, squares, fittings, etc.
metal-cutting-with-a-bandsaw.fifth-p: The use of blanks made of steel of various grades, non-ferrous metals, light alloys, and cast iron is allowed.

bending-of-reinforcement.first-p: For the assembly of various metal structures, steel smooth and ribbed reinforcement, which is given the necessary shape, is often used.
bending-of-reinforcement.second-p: We have at our disposal special equipment with numerical software control, on which you can quickly and accurately give the armature any shape.
bending-of-reinforcement.third-p: The entire process is controlled by a computer program, which has in its arsenal a huge number of typical types of bending of metal rods.
bending-of-reinforcement.fourth-p: After the end of bending, there is no need to correct the corners, the distance between the ends is minimal and ready for further welding work, the ribs of the reinforcement are not deformed, the integrity of the bar is not violated.
bending-of-reinforcement.fifth-p: If the customer needs an unusual configuration, our specialists will program it according to the provided sketches or drawings.

lathe-works.first-p: We perform, on specialized turning equipment, mechanical processing of workpieces of any complexity to order - threading, countersinking, facing, chamfering, grooving, grooving, drilling holes and other works.
lathe-works.second-p: The equipment allows processing of both external and internal surfaces of the workpiece with high accuracy. As a result, the client receives an absolutely smooth part of the given shape. In addition, in our company, you can order milling of grooves, flat and helical surfaces, and others.
lathe-works.third-p: In the course of work, quality control and compliance with certain requirements for manufactured metal products are carried out.
